virtualTable.name: radiosondes_max
virtualTable.sql: select geom, indexnbr,wigosid, MAX(sondestatus) as sondestatus from ( select * , CASE WHEN NOT invola THEN 'notinvola' WHEN isempty THEN 'empty' WHEN nr_received_2_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_3_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_4_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_29_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_2_strato > 0 AND nr_received_3_strato > 0 AND nr_received_4_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_29_strato > 0 THEN 'complete' WHEN nr_received_3_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_3_strato > 0 AND nr_received_4_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_4_strato > 0 AND nr_received_2_tropo = 0 AND nr_received_29_tropo = 0 THEN 'pilot' WHEN nr_received_strato = 0 AND nr_received_2_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_3_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_4_tropo > 0 AND nr_received_29_tropo > 0 THEN 'incompletelayers' ELSE 'incompletevariables' END as sondestatus from ( select s.geom,s.isempty,s.invola,s.indexnbr,wigosid,stationname,center, SUM(nr_received) as nr_received, sum( CASE WHEN hasduplicate THEN 0 ELSE nr_expected END ) as nr_expected, AVG(per_received) as per_received, sum( CASE WHEN level = 'stra' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as nr_stra , sum( CASE WHEN level='trop' AND varid=2 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_2_tropo, sum( CASE WHEN level='trop' AND varid=3 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_3_tropo, sum( CASE WHEN level='trop' AND varid=4 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_4_tropo, sum( CASE WHEN level='trop' AND varid=29 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_29_tropo, sum( CASE WHEN level='stra' AND varid=2 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_2_strato, sum( CASE WHEN level='stra' AND varid=3 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_3_strato, sum( CASE WHEN level='stra' AND varid=4 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_4_strato, sum( CASE WHEN level='stra' AND varid=29 THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_29_strato, sum( CASE WHEN level='stra' THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_strato, sum( CASE WHEN level='trop' THEN nr_received ELSE 0 END ) as nr_received_tropo from stationsbyperiodex s where assimilationdate = '%year%-%month%-%day% %hourperiod%:00:00' and varid in (2,3,4,29) group by s.geom,isempty,invola,s.indexnbr,wigosid,stationname, center ) as subq ) as subq2 group by geom,indexnbr,wigosid
